TopicTitle: Unable to run test on Mk 1 Inline Cockpit

Articles.Content:
I am running KSP 1.0.2 with several mods (all up to date). The issue I'm having is that when all conditions are met I am unable to complete a contract for running a test on the Mk 1 Inline Cockpit, there is simply no option to do so. Am I missing something? Or is this a known issue? Thanks in advance.

![D2PRtT0.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/D2PRtT0.jpg)
Ditto. Landed on Kerbin, can't do "Run Test". On Linux, x64 version, with a bunch of mods.

Good to know I'm not the only one, I suppose. It's very annoying-basically rendering any of these contracts useless. I'm guessing it has to be some sort of mod conflict, but I don't have the first clue as to what could be the culprit.
